document.full_text: uk competition authorities are to probe the stranglehold of the world's biggest accountancy firms on british blue-chip company audits after finding evidence of anti-competitive behavior.
document.title: uk to probe big four auditing stranglehold
lines_and_colors: uk competition authorities are to probe the stranglehold of the world's biggest accountancy firms on british blue-chip company audits after finding evidence of anti-competitive behavior.
